reviewPeriod.title: Review Period
reviewPeriod.description: The certian period to complain on published conditions

reviewProceedings.title: Review Proceedings
reviewProceedings.description: General information related to reviews under this contracting process together with collected complaints and reviews

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.description: Complaints to the conditions and decisions

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: Review Procedures conducted due to complaints received

Complaint.title: Complaint
Complaint.description: A complaint submitted against conditions or decision made

date.title: Submission date
date.description: Date of submission of this complaint

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the complaint

statusDetails.title: Status details
statusDetails.description: The details of current status of the complaint

description.title: Description
description.description: Free-text description for this complaint provided by complainer

complainer.title: Complainer
complainer.description: Legal entity who have submitted this complaint

milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.description: A list of milestones associated with the complaint

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: All documents and attachments related to the complaint

objections.title: Objections
objections.description: A list of precise subjects and requests under this complaint

previousProceeding.title: Previous proceeding
previousProceeding.description: If this complaint is escalated from previous one sent to and rejected or declined by Procuring Entity, the id of such complaint could be specified to fulfill the requirements dual-stage review system

Review.title: Review procedure
Review.description: Review Procedure conducted agains one or more complaints

date.title: Initiation date
date.description: Date of initiation of this procedure

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the procedure

statusDetails.title: Status details
statusDetails.description: The details of current status of the procedure

relatedComplaints.title: Related complaints
relatedComplaints.description: A list of the id's of complaints covered by this procedure

milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.description: A list of milestones associated with the procedure

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: All documents and attachments related to the procedure

objectionResponses.title: Objection responses
objectionResponses.description: A list of responses against all actions requested under relatede complaints

Objection.title: Objection
Objection.description: A precise subject and requests expected to be responded

description.title: Description
description.description: Bojections' brief description provided by complainer

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the objection

statusDetails.title: Status details
statusDetails.description: The details of current status of the objection

relatesTo.title: Relates to
relatesTo.description: The schema element that the objection affects. For example objection may be defined against lot or against award

relatedItem.title: Related item
relatedItem.description: The id of the schema element which the objection affects on.

classification.title: Classification
classification.description: Classification according to Review Bodies' approach to systemize subjects of complaint

requestedActions.title: Requested actions
requestedActions.description: A list of precise actions requested under this objection

RequestedAction.title: Requested action
RequestedAction.description: A precise action requested to satisfy an objection under complaint

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier for this requested action

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the requested action

source.title: Source
source.description: The party that will be obliged to take the requested action if the objection is satisfied

description.title: Description
description.description: Free text description of the requested action provided by complainer

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier for this response on objection

justification.title: Justification
justification.description: Free text justification for response provided by adressed Party
